Body:
I'm getting 403 Forbidden" when trying to use Postman in order to add a POST call so that I can add bulk devices to IBM Watson IoT Platform

"

Using Advanced Rest Client did the trick. I found out that the orgin header needs to be orgid.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com"; and it seems that you cannot override it in POSTMAN - it prevents you from doing so. The watson platform CORS implementation allows only either no orgin or orgid.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com"

The bulk add endpoint /api/v0002/bulk/devices/add works fine for me in the Postman native app. I get the

201 Created

back and they are created.

You are sparse on details but I'd guess you are using the chrome addon. Go Native for the best Postman experience.

"
Yes, I'm using the Chrome add-on. Will try with the native one.
